value:
$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Eitri! Ready the weapon!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|What's this now? Retreating to me?
How pathetic.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Silence! The Askrans are descending
as we speak.$k$pHow have you managed to foil my
plans with your dawdling even after
I went to the trouble of capturing—$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I am creating a divine weapon here!
Do not pretend you would have even
a faint idea where to begin doing so!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Enough! Just hurry up and use it
against them! Surely you've made
progress enough to buy us time.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|So hasty. Keep rushing my craft,
and you're bound to—$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Oh, shut up! We've no time for this!
Just do it already.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hmph... Fine, fine. I must admit I am
curious to learn how it will function
under battlefield conditions.$k$p$EFace|I'm sorry, Summoner, but I'll have
to keep you waiting here a moment.
You understand, don't you?$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Is that you, $Nu?!$k$pNo, it's... Are those...Heroes?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Something's wrong. They look...off.
Almost as if they're empty shells...
What happened here?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|This is no time to launch
an investigation, you two!
They're coming!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_09,0|$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Defeat, hm? Well, I suppose victory
would be too much to expect from
rushed attempts and failures.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What do you mean, failures?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|I've been exploring the capabilities
of the summoner's divine weapon,
you see...$k$pI'm hoping to make something similar
using seiðjárn, so I've been studying
its intricacies.$k$p$EFace_Smile|But so far I've only achieved failure,
like the beings you just encountered.$k$pEven after summoning, without the
power of the god-dragon, I cannot
bind them to me by contract.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|So, these people you've summoned...$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Like I said: failures. Their summons
were incomplete, so even as former
Heroes, their souls were destroyed...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That's terrible! Don't you understand
that these are actual people you're
toying with?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Of course I know that! That's why
I'm working to overcome the issue.
It's a process. Trial and error.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|No! This... What you're doing here
is unforgivable!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Eitri... I put my faith in you...
Ugh! What a fool I was!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|So, you're a villain after all, then...
That makes you our enemy!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Heh... Oooh... How scary!
What ever shall I do?$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi500|Argh! Everyone, after her!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|

$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Was it...Askr's summoner? No...
No, it couldn't have been. It was
someone else.$k$pAnd yet, after our fight, there's been
something...sticking in my— Gah!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Rrrgh... My head... Always this pain
in my head... Always this damn pain!$k$pThe closer I get to Askr, the more
it sings out... I don't understand!$k$p$EFace_Cool|No matter. It must be done. I must
continue on my way... On to Askr!$k$p$Sbs150|
